package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: Asynchronous DNS Resolver Library
package-manager.description: ARES (Asynchronous Resolver) is a C library that performs DNS requests and name resolves asynchronously. This package is based on c-ares, a fork and enhanced version of the original ARES library.
